data.text: @beastoftraal According to some interviews from the quint, even the public is forgiving enough to say COVID was not mismanaged and it wasn't the govt's fault. Before 2014 everything was the Govt's fault, now nothing is but we have a strong Govt. Mind-boggling
@beastoftraal Itâ€™s not about public memory, this is gaslighting at unprecedented scale and the utter lack of any shame
@beastoftraal And the modi led bjp is the master at this.
